title: New client
body: Man seriously Did you guys not see How angry people were when windows forced people to update to windows 10..... You guys just did the same thing but worse the client is no where near ready, I use to run league at 200+ (uncap) now i get frame rate spikes non-stop And I'm getting dc issues too.. At leat give us the option guys... Please For the love of this game change it back And give us the option to update first. Please don't be rude.
